meta.title: Brainrot Craft - The Ultimate Meme Sandbox Adventure
meta.description: Craft, Merge, Build, and Survive in a World Gone Viral. Play Brainrot Craft now!

hero.title: Craft Brainrot
hero.subtitle: The Ultimate Meme Sandbox Adventure. Craft, Merge, Build, and Survive in a World Gone Viral.

headline.title: Unleash Your Inner Meme Lord. What Will You Create?
headline.description: Dive into the chaotic world of Brainrot, where logic takes a backseat to pure, unadulterated meme-crafting madness. Whether you're merging elements to birth new viral sensations or building epic structures in a blocky sandbox, the only limit is your imagination (and your tolerance for the absurd).

items.title: MERGE & DISCOVER
items.description: Combine everyday items with iconic internet memes. Start with basic elements and unlock thousands of hilarious and bizarre creations. Can you craft the ultimate Brainrot?

items.title: BUILD & SURVIVE
items.description: Explore vast, pixelated worlds. Gather resources, build your base, and fend off strange, meme-inspired creatures. From a simple shelter to a sprawling meme empire.

items.title: SUMMON & COLLECT
items.description: Uncover the secrets of the Brainrot universe. Trade with mysterious sellers to summon unique creatures and characters. Collect them all and become the master of the meme-verse.

items.question: What is Brainrot Craft?
items.answer: Brainrot Craft is the ultimate meme sandbox adventure where you can craft, merge, build, and survive in a world gone viral. It combines alchemy-style crafting with sandbox survival gameplay.

items.question: How do I play the game?
items.answer: Simply scroll up to the game section above and start playing immediately in your browser! No download required.

items.question: Is Brainrot Craft free to play?
items.answer: Yes! Brainrot Craft is absolutely free-to-play with no paywalls or hidden fees. Just pure, uninterrupted gameplay.

items.question: How does the crafting system work?
items.answer: Start with basic elements and combine them with iconic internet memes to unlock thousands of hilarious and bizarre creations. The system is ever-expanding with new combinations added regularly.

items.question: What platforms is it available on?
items.answer: Brainrot Craft is available on web browsers, Android, and iOS devices. You can play anywhere, anytime with offline support.

items.question: Can I share my creations?
items.answer: Absolutely! Share your most unhinged creations with friends in one click. Show off your meme masterpieces to the world.

cta.title: Choose Your Brainrot Adventure
cta.subtitle: Instant-play meme merging. No download required.
